class.name: vito_controllers/CartesianImpedanceVitoController
class.description: The CartesianImpedanceVitoController tracks effort commands (as in JointImpedanceController from KUKA_LWR/LWR_CONTROLLERS). It expects a EffortJointInterface type of hardware interface.

class.name: vito_controllers/VitoBridgeController
class.description: The VitoBridgeController gets input on a ROS topic and uses the received torques as commands to the robot. The robot dynamics is compensated internally by the KUKA KCL software.
